name: grav
description: Grav is a flat-file CMS that allows users to build websites without a database. It supports themes, plugins, markdown content, and runs extremely fast, suitable for blogs, documentation sites, or landing pages.
features: Flat-File Architecture: Build websites without database dependencies using markdown and YAML files.
Fast Performance: Exceptional speed with built-in caching and optimized file-based content delivery.
Theme System: Choose from hundreds of responsive themes or create custom designs.
Plugin Ecosystem: Extend functionality with plugins for forms, SEO, e-commerce, and more.
Markdown Content: Write content in markdown with support for shortcodes and custom formatting.
Admin Panel: Optional web-based admin interface for content management and configuration.
Version Control Friendly: Store entire site in Git for easy deployment and collaboration.
Flexible Deployment: Host on any PHP-enabled server with minimal requirements.
